description: Mobile techniques used by Dark Caracal, ATT&CK group G0070 v1.2
name: Dark Caracal (G0070)

techniques.comment: [Dark Caracal](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0070) distributes [Pallas](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0399) via trojanized applications hosted on watering hole websites.(Citation: Lookout Dark Caracal Jan 2018)
[Dark Caracal](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0070) controls implants using standard HTTP communication.(Citation: Lookout Dark Caracal Jan 2018)
